title: The Thom Hartmann Show - May 9, 2008 (24kbs Audio 113 min)
description:
"Anything Goes Friday"

Hour One: Guest: U.S. Senator (I-VT)  Bernie Sanders www.sanders.senate.gov

Hour Two - Code Pink Medea Benjamin (plus Iraqi refugee who&#039;s husband and 4 yr old daughter were killed by militia because he was an interpreter for the U.S.) www.codepinkalert.org Topic: Just back from Jordan and Syria where she spoke with Iraqi mothers

Hour Three  - U.S. Congressman (D-NJ, 12th District) Congressman Rush Holt www.holt.house.gov  Topic: His recent trip to Iraq
